name: Glassed
description:
Glassed is a fan-made Halo game created by a small group of friends. They intend to bring you a game that they'd love to play, with their own style and liberties, inspired by the past art and gameplay masterpieces that the Halo titles used to be. Glassed is set in an alternate timeline of the Halo multiverse.
Unlike other Halo fan projects, Glassed sets itself apart by being a FPS/RPG mix, like Bungie's Destiny.
